text: Vando Jorge Lopes Da Costa Neto (born 24 July 1992), simply known as Vando, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a midfielder for UD Rei Amador and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Vando made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2015. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Sporting Praia Cruz players Category:UDRA players
title: Vando
